akn:section.akn:heading: Right to full and fair hearing

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1214. Right to full and fair hearing No member of the armed forces may be retired or separated for physical disability without a full and fair hearing if he demands it. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 100.)
